text: Need return authorization for monitor - doesn't fit properly. Original packaging intact, tags attached, unused condition. Bought 8 days ago.
Return received at center 5 days ago. Inspection complete. Processing $29.99 refund now - expect in payment method within 3-5 business days.
Item stopped working after 10 days. Manufacturing defect, not user damage. Past 30-day return window. Warranty coverage or exception possible?
Item at 12 days is outside standard 30-day return policy but manufacturing defect may qualify for warranty. I'll make one-time exception - return authorized.
Initiated return 10 days ago via UPS Store. Tracking shows delivered to return center 5 days ago. Still no refund $89.99 processed.
Duplicate order return accepted. Unopened item in original packaging qualifies for full refund. No restocking fee. Return label emailed for $89.99 refund.
Accidentally ordered duplicate laptop. One unopened in original packaging. Can I return just unopened one? Need return label and refund $14.99.
